message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm sure you'll agree it's a generous offer.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided.  Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's time to get serious, the clock is ticking!
Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45 in my favor. I think it's a reasonable deal, considering the inflation.  Let's end this game.
